overview: At the Elementary School "Ahmet Hromadžić" in Bosanski Petrovac, there is a good practice that religious education teachers take students to visit various facilities of religious communities that exist in the city in an organized manner once a year. In this way, children get acquainted with the specifics of other religious communities, which results in mutual respect and appreciation of diversity. This film is the story of one such visit.
title: Suživot različitosti
